content:
# Factorio Agent Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Functional Power Plant at (-9.5, 0.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 0.5) facing right
- Boiler at (-7.0, 1.5) facing right (contains 10 coal)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 1.5) facing right
- Connected with water pipes between pump and boiler
- Connected with steam pipes between boiler and engine
- Small electric pole at (-2.5, 3.5) connecting to power network

### Smelting and Production Area
- Iron smelting furnace at (5.0, 0.0)
- Copper smelting furnace at (5.0, 4.0)
- Gear assembler at (8.5, 0.5)
- Cable assembler at (8.5, 4.5)
- Power poles at (2.5, 2.5) connecting the area to power network

## ERROR TIPS

### Fluid connection issues
- Verify pipe connections are properly aligned with entity connection points
- Ensure there are no gaps in pipe connections between fluid entities
- Check entity orientations match for proper fluid flow direction

### Placement conflicts
- Always check target positions are clear before placing entities
- Remove existing entities before attempting to place new ones in same location
- Verify terrain is suitable for placement (avoid water for non-water entities)

### Power distribution
- Ensure power poles are placed within connection range of each other
- Verify all production buildings are within power pole coverage area
- Check power network connectivity when adding new buildings

### Production setup
- Confirm furnaces have fuel before attempting smelting
- Verify assemblers have required recipes set
- Check power connections for all production buildings

### General tips
- Monitor entity status messages for troubleshooting clues
- When rebuilding, completely remove old structures first
- Plan pipe and power pole placement paths before building
